OpenIdConnect.ClientId: {Your web application client ID goes here}
OpenIdConnect.ClientSecret: {Your web application client secret goes here}
OpenIdConnect.Authority: https://login.microsoftonline.com/{Your Azure AD tenant ID goes here}/

MicrosoftGraph.ClientId: {Your native application Client ID goes here}
MicrosoftGraph.UserName: {Your O365 mailbox user name goes here}
MicrosoftGraph.Password: {Your O365 mailbox user password goes here}

EmailRecipient: {The email address you want to send mail to goes here}
